ActJudges Act
SubjectHon. Gloria R. Klowak ** RESIGNATION AND ANNUITY **
PrecisResignation and granting of an ANNUITY to the Hon. GLORIA R. KLOWAK, a Judge of the Superior Court of Justice in and for the Province of Ontario, effective April 30, 2013.
AttachmentsAttachment
